statements: SELECT * FROM crime_data
SELECT id, crime_category FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT crime_location, crime_date, crime_time FROM crime_data WHERE crime_category = 'Robbery'
SELECT id, crime_location FROM crime_data ORDER BY crime_location ASC
SELECT id, crime_category, crime_time FROM crime_data ORDER BY crime_time DESC
SELECT * FROM crime_data ORDER BY crime_date DESC, crime_time ASC
SELECT id, crime_category FROM crime_data WHERE crime_category = 'Robbery'
SELECT crime_category, crime_location FROM crime_data WHERE crime_location LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT id, crime_date, crime_time FROM crime_data WHERE crime_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT * FROM crime_data WHERE crime_location = 'Park'
SELECT * FROM crime_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, crime_type FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT location, severity FROM crime_hotspots WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE location = ST_POINT(3.14, 2.71);
SELECT report_date, crime_type FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE location = POINT(10, 20)
SELECT report_id, report_date, crime_type FROM crime_reports WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery'
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reports, crime_type FROM crime_reports GROUP BY crime_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT reported_by, COUNT(*) AS reports_count FROM crime_reports GROUP BY reported_by ORDER BY reports_count DESC
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Theft';
SELECT crime_location, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Assault' ORDER BY crime_date DESC;
SELECT crime_type, COUNT(*) AS total_crimes FROM crimes GROUP BY crime_type;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT hotspot_location, reported_incidents FROM crime_hotspots ORDER BY reported_incidents DESC;
SELECT * FROM crimes ORDER BY crime_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT crime_type, crime_date FROM crimes WHERE crime_location LIKE '%street%' ORDER BY crime_date ASC;
SELECT c.crime_id, c.crime_type, cr.report_description FROM crimes c JOIN crime_reports cr ON c.crime_id = cr.crime_id WHERE cr.report_id > 100 ORDER BY cr.report_date DESC;
SELECT h.hotspot_id, h.hotspot_location, COUNT(*) AS total_incidents FROM crime_hotspots h GROUP BY h.hotspot_id ORDER BY total_incidents DESC;
SELECT AVG(reported_incidents) AS avg_incidents FROM crime_hotspots WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery';
SELECT * FROM crime_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM crime_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM crime_locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT category_name, description FROM crime_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'Theft%';
SELECT report_id, location_id, category_id FROM crime_analysis LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM crime_reports
SELECT report_id, report_date, crime_type, location FROM crime_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT category_name, description FROM crime_categories ORDER BY category_name ASC

SELECT report_id, report_date, crime_type, location_name FROM crime_reports JOIN crime_analysis ON crime_reports.report_id = crime_analysis.report_id JOIN crime_locations ON crime_analysis.location_id = crime_locations.location_id
SELECT analysis_id, report_id, location_id, category_id, analysis_date FROM crime_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
SELECT * FROM crimes;
SELECT id, description, location FROM crimes WHERE date='2022-01-15';
SELECT id, name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE age > 30;
SELECT id, address, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude < 40.0;
SELECT id, details, status FROM reports WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM crimes WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, description, location FROM crimes WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE age > 30 AND arrested = TRUE;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM suspects WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents JOIN reports ON incidents.id = reports.incident_id WHERE status = 'resolved';
